cab.content: Military Secret.From Viceroy, Army Department, 22nd June 1917.(Received 23rd, 6 a.m.)9236. Mahsad operations. On 20th, force occupied Ispana Raghsa,about two miles north of Barwand, driving Mahsuds from adjacent heightsin which operations lst-25th I .ondons are mentioned as doing noticeablygood work. Our casualties were, killed, 1 British, 5 Indian ranks ; wounded,3 British (group omitfed)s, 1 Indian officer, 11 Indian ranks, 1 follower.Force Headquarters report troops are keeping fit, climate being pleasant andnights cool.i
